## `Close` {#batch-close}

Closes the project.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
Close(boolean saveChanges = false)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| `boolean` saveChanges | Specifies whether to save any changes made to the project. (The default is `false`.) |
:::
